ayahs.ar: حمٓ
ayahs.en: Ha, Meem

ayahs.ar: وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayahs.en: By the clear Book

ayahs.ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night. Indeed, We were to warn [mankind]

ayahs.ar: فِيهَا يُفۡرَقُ كُلُّ أَمۡرٍ حَكِيمٍ
ayahs.en: On that night is made distinct every precise matter

ayahs.ar: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ
ayahs.en: [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]

ayahs.ar: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayahs.en: As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

ayahs.ar: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayahs.en: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain

ayahs.ar: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.en: There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

ayahs.ar: بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
ayahs.en: But they are in doubt, amusing themselves

ayahs.ar: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayahs.en: Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke

ayahs.ar: يَغۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَۖ هَٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayahs.en: Covering the people; this is a painful torment

ayahs.ar: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayahs.en: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers

ayahs.ar: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayahs.en: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger

ayahs.ar: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ
ayahs.en: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief]

ayahs.ar: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
ayahs.en: The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution

ayahs.ar: ۞وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ
ayahs.en: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger

ayahs.ar: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ
ayahs.en: [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allah. Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger

ayahs.ar: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayahs.en: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority

ayahs.ar: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ
ayahs.en: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me

ayahs.ar: وَإِن لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ لِي فَٱعۡتَزِلُونِ
ayahs.en: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone

ayahs.ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ
ayahs.en: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people

ayahs.ar: فَأَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِي لَيۡلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
ayahs.en: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued

ayahs.ar: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ
ayahs.en: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned

ayahs.ar: كَمۡ تَرَكُواْ مِن جَنَّـٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
ayahs.en: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

ayahs.ar: وَزُرُوعٖ وَمَقَامٖ كَرِيمٖ
ayahs.en: And crops and noble sites

ayahs.ar: وَنَعۡمَةٖ كَانُواْ فِيهَا فَٰكِهِينَ
ayahs.en: And comfort wherein they were amused

ayahs.ar: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَٰهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayahs.en: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people

ayahs.ar: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ
ayahs.en: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved

ayahs.ar: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ
ayahs.en: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment

ayahs.ar: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
ayahs.en: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors

ayahs.ar: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.en: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds

ayahs.ar: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.en: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying

ayahs.ar: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
ayahs.en: There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected

ayahs.ar: فَأۡتُواْ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.en: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful

ayahs.ar: أَهُمۡ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ قَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
ayahs.en: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals

ayahs.ar: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ
ayahs.en: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play

ayahs.ar: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayahs.en: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ مِيقَٰتُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all

ayahs.ar: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
ayahs.en: The Day when no relation will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped

ayahs.ar: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.en: Except those [believers] on whom Allah has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
ayahs.en: Indeed, the tree of zaqqum

ayahs.ar: طَعَامُ ٱلۡأَثِيمِ
ayahs.en: Is food for the sinful

ayahs.ar: كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ يَغۡلِي فِي ٱلۡبُطُونِ
ayahs.en: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

ayahs.ar: كَغَلۡيِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
ayahs.en: Like the boiling of scalding water

ayahs.ar: خُذُوهُ فَٱعۡتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayahs.en: [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire

ayahs.ar: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
ayahs.en: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water

ayahs.ar: ذُقۡ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡكَرِيمُ
ayahs.en: [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, this is what you used to dispute

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي مَقَامٍ أَمِينٖ
ayahs.en: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place

ayahs.ar: فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
ayahs.en: Within gardens and springs

ayahs.ar: يَلۡبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٖ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
ayahs.en: Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other

ayahs.ar: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
ayahs.en: Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes

ayahs.ar: يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
ayahs.en: They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure

ayahs.ar: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayahs.en: They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

ayahs.ar: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
ayahs.en: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment

ayahs.ar: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.en: And indeed, We have eased the Qur'an in your tongue that they might be reminded

ayahs.ar: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ إِنَّهُم مُّرۡتَقِبُونَ
ayahs.en: So watch, [O Muhammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end]
